item.title: Two killed in suspected Palestinian ramming and knife attack in Israel
item.description: Police say the attacker, from the occupied West Bank, ran over at least one person before stabbing another victim several miles away.

item.title: Zelensky plans to meet Trump on Sunday for talks on ending Russian war
item.description: The Ukrainian leader says he will see the US president in Florida and believes "a lot can be decided before the new year".

item.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
item.description: President Trump has previously accused the Nigerian government of failing to protect Christians from jihadists.

item.title: Blast at Syrian mosque during Friday prayers leaves at least eight dead
item.description: The explosion in Homs targeted a predominantly Alawite area, a sect that has faced crackdowns and violence since the fall of former-President Bashar a...

item.title: Ex-Malaysia PM Najib Razak given 15-year jail term over state funds scandal
item.description: Najib was convicted for his role in the billion-dollar scandal involving the country's sovereign wealth fund 1MDB.
